column4: Oh no, I forgot to buy an After Pill! What now?
Ugh... Looks like I will have to accept that she might get pregnant.
I want you to take the pill.""
O-Of course. Right. How could we raise a baby, afterall? We're still in school.
I don't know how to raise a baby either, I wouldn't know what to do with a child.
Yeah, taking the pill would be best. Yeah, I'll do just that. Yep.

column5: I want you to have the baby.""

column4: B-B-But I don't know how to take care of a child!
W-We're still in school too! There's no way we could!
Trust me. It'll be fine. I'll take responsibility.
W-Will you really? Will you really, truly?!
Of course. Have I ever let you down?
N-No, you haven't. You're always the sweetest, and you always try to do what's best for me.
Then trust me this time too.
